text: Every time you light up a cigarette, you are saying that your life isn't worth living.
The biggest favor you can do for yourself is to quit smoking and embrace a healthier life.
Your life is a precious gift. Don't burn it away with cigarettes.
Quitting smoking is the first step to claiming your freedom and taking control of your destiny.
You are stronger than your cravings. Don't let a cigarette control your life.
Believe in yourself and your ability to quit. You have the power to change your life.
The journey to quitting smoking is tough, but the destination is worth it.
Your body is a temple. Treat it with love and respect by quitting smoking.
You are not giving up anything by quitting smoking; you are gaining a healthier, happier life.
